name: Quest for the Cubes - Demo
description:
The Cubes are living peaceful life, but one day evil Spheres decide to turn them into them...

We have items with inventory, conversation with quests and a really annoying music. 

Controls

Use WASD to walk around,
Use mouse to control camera,
Press Left Alt to disable camera,
Walk over items to take them.
